options.content:
# Mortgage Payoff Analysis

Track payoff progress, projected completion timing, and payment sensitivity.

Assumptions: uses mortgage-tagged liabilities (`is_mortgage = TRUE`), trailing 12-month average payments, and blended estimated mortgage interest rate from debt tracking.

targets.rawSql:
WITH mortgage_history AS (
  SELECT
    period_month AS time,
    SUM(outstanding_debt_balance) AS remaining_mortgage_balance
  FROM reporting.rpt_debt_reduction_tracking
  WHERE is_mortgage = TRUE
  GROUP BY period_month
)
SELECT
  time,
  remaining_mortgage_balance AS "Remaining Mortgage Balance"
FROM mortgage_history
ORDER BY time

WITH mortgage_history AS (
  SELECT
    period_month,
    SUM(outstanding_debt_balance) AS current_balance,
    SUM(principal_reduction) AS monthly_principal_reduction,
    SUM(total_monthly_payment) AS monthly_payment,
    CASE
      WHEN SUM(outstanding_debt_balance) > 0
      THEN SUM(outstanding_debt_balance * (estimated_interest_rate_pct / 100.0)) / SUM(outstanding_debt_balance)
      ELSE AVG(estimated_interest_rate_pct)
    END AS blended_interest_rate_pct
  FROM reporting.rpt_debt_reduction_tracking
  WHERE is_mortgage = TRUE
  GROUP BY period_month
),
latest_state AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM mortgage_history
  ORDER BY period_month DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
assumption_window AS (
  SELECT
    AVG(GREATEST(monthly_principal_reduction, 0)) AS avg_monthly_principal_reduction,
    AVG(GREATEST(monthly_payment, 0)) AS avg_monthly_payment
  FROM (
    SELECT *
    FROM mortgage_history
    ORDER BY period_month DESC
    LIMIT 12
  ) w
),
assumptions AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(ls.current_balance, 0) AS current_balance,
    COALESCE(aw.avg_monthly_principal_reduction, 0) AS avg_monthly_principal_reduction,
    COALESCE(aw.avg_monthly_payment, 0) AS avg_monthly_payment,
    COALESCE(ls.blended_interest_rate_pct, 0) / 100.0 / 12.0 AS monthly_interest_rate
  FROM latest_state ls
  CROSS JOIN assumption_window aw
)
SELECT
  ROUND(
    CASE
      WHEN current_balance <= 0 THEN 0
      WHEN avg_monthly_payment <= 0 THEN 0
      WHEN monthly_interest_rate > 0
           AND avg_monthly_payment > current_balance * monthly_interest_rate
      THEN (
        LN(avg_monthly_payment / (avg_monthly_payment - current_balance * monthly_interest_rate))
        / LN(1 + monthly_interest_rate)
      ) / 12
      WHEN monthly_interest_rate = 0 THEN current_balance / NULLIF(avg_monthly_payment, 0) / 12
      WHEN avg_monthly_principal_reduction > 0 THEN current_balance / avg_monthly_principal_reduction / 12
      ELSE 0
    END::numeric,
    1
  ) AS "Years to Payoff"
FROM assumptions;

WITH latest_mortgage AS (
  SELECT period_month, SUM(outstanding_debt_balance) AS balance
  FROM reporting.rpt_debt_reduction_tracking
  WHERE is_mortgage = TRUE
  GROUP BY period_month
  ORDER BY period_month DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT COALESCE((SELECT balance FROM latest_mortgage), 0) AS "Current Balance";

WITH monthly_reductions AS (
  SELECT period_month, SUM(principal_reduction) AS reduction
  FROM reporting.rpt_debt_reduction_tracking
  WHERE is_mortgage = TRUE
  GROUP BY period_month
  ORDER BY period_month DESC
  LIMIT 12
)
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(GREATEST(reduction, 0))::numeric, 2), 0) AS "Average Monthly Reduction"
FROM monthly_reductions;

WITH mortgage_history AS (
  SELECT
    period_month,
    SUM(outstanding_debt_balance) AS current_balance,
    SUM(principal_reduction) AS monthly_principal_reduction,
    SUM(total_monthly_payment) AS monthly_payment,
    CASE
      WHEN SUM(outstanding_debt_balance) > 0
      THEN SUM(outstanding_debt_balance * (estimated_interest_rate_pct / 100.0)) / SUM(outstanding_debt_balance)
      ELSE AVG(estimated_interest_rate_pct)
    END AS blended_interest_rate_pct
  FROM reporting.rpt_debt_reduction_tracking
  WHERE is_mortgage = TRUE
  GROUP BY period_month
),
latest_state AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM mortgage_history
  ORDER BY period_month DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
assumption_window AS (
  SELECT
    AVG(GREATEST(monthly_principal_reduction, 0)) AS avg_monthly_principal_reduction,
    AVG(GREATEST(monthly_payment, 0)) AS avg_monthly_payment
  FROM (
    SELECT *
    FROM mortgage_history
    ORDER BY period_month DESC
    LIMIT 12
  ) w
),
assumptions AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(ls.current_balance, 0) AS current_balance,
    COALESCE(aw.avg_monthly_principal_reduction, 0) AS avg_monthly_principal_reduction,
    COALESCE(aw.avg_monthly_payment, 0) AS avg_monthly_payment,
    COALESCE(ls.blended_interest_rate_pct, 0) / 100.0 / 12.0 AS monthly_interest_rate
  FROM latest_state ls
  CROSS JOIN assumption_window aw
),
payoff_projection AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN current_balance <= 0 THEN 0
      WHEN avg_monthly_payment <= 0 THEN 0
      WHEN monthly_interest_rate > 0
           AND avg_monthly_payment > current_balance * monthly_interest_rate
      THEN (
        LN(avg_monthly_payment / (avg_monthly_payment - current_balance * monthly_interest_rate))
        / LN(1 + monthly_interest_rate)
      )
      WHEN monthly_interest_rate = 0 THEN current_balance / NULLIF(avg_monthly_payment, 0)
      WHEN avg_monthly_principal_reduction > 0 THEN current_balance / avg_monthly_principal_reduction
      ELSE 0
    END AS months_to_payoff
  FROM assumptions
)
SELECT
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE + (CEIL(months_to_payoff)::int * INTERVAL '1 month')) AS "Estimated Payoff Year"
FROM payoff_projection;

panels.description: Mortgage payoff sensitivity analysis: impact of extra payments on payoff timeline

targets.rawSql:
WITH mortgage_history AS (
  SELECT
    period_month,
    SUM(outstanding_debt_balance) AS outstanding_debt_balance,
    SUM(total_monthly_payment) AS monthly_payment,
    CASE
      WHEN SUM(outstanding_debt_balance) > 0
      THEN SUM(outstanding_debt_balance * (estimated_interest_rate_pct / 100.0)) / SUM(outstanding_debt_balance)
      ELSE AVG(estimated_interest_rate_pct)
    END AS blended_interest_rate_pct
  FROM reporting.rpt_debt_reduction_tracking
  WHERE is_mortgage = TRUE
  GROUP BY period_month
),
latest_mortgage AS (
  SELECT
    outstanding_debt_balance,
    monthly_payment,
    blended_interest_rate_pct / 100.0 / 12.0 AS monthly_interest_rate
  FROM mortgage_history
  ORDER BY period_month DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
scenario_inputs AS (
  SELECT 0::numeric AS extra_payment
  UNION ALL SELECT 100
  UNION ALL SELECT 250
  UNION ALL SELECT 500
  UNION ALL SELECT 1000
),
sensitivity_scenarios AS (
  SELECT
    si.extra_payment,
    CASE
      WHEN lm.outstanding_debt_balance <= 0 THEN 0
      WHEN (lm.monthly_payment + si.extra_payment) <= 0 THEN NULL
      WHEN lm.monthly_interest_rate > 0
           AND (lm.monthly_payment + si.extra_payment) > lm.outstanding_debt_balance * lm.monthly_interest_rate
      THEN (
        LN((lm.monthly_payment + si.extra_payment) /
          ((lm.monthly_payment + si.extra_payment) - lm.outstanding_debt_balance * lm.monthly_interest_rate))
        / LN(1 + lm.monthly_interest_rate)
      ) / 12
      WHEN lm.monthly_interest_rate = 0 THEN lm.outstanding_debt_balance / NULLIF(lm.monthly_payment + si.extra_payment, 0) / 12
      ELSE NULL
    END AS years_to_payoff
  FROM latest_mortgage lm
  CROSS JOIN scenario_inputs si
)
SELECT extra_payment,
       COALESCE(ROUND(years_to_payoff::numeric, 1), 0) AS "Years to Payoff"
FROM sensitivity_scenarios
UNION ALL
SELECT 0 AS extra_payment, 0::numeric AS "Years to Payoff"
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sensitivity_scenarios)
ORDER BY extra_payment;

panels.title: Debt Payoff Sensitivity (Extra Payments vs Payoff Timeline)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  to_char(MAX(period_month), 'Mon YYYY') AS "Data Through",
  to_char(MAX(report_generated_at), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "Last Refresh",
  'Australia/Melbourne' AS "Timezone",
  'Monthly (review quarterly)' AS "Expected Cadence"
FROM reporting.rpt_debt_reduction_tracking
WHERE is_mortgage = TRUE;
